channel.title: HELp MOD PLZ answer
channel.description: Alright, all my tutorials here are not being accepted. even the one that I MADE SURE NO SPELLING IS WRONG AND ITS OVER 3 PAGES(PART1) in my DOCUMENT FILE,, DOESNT WORK!!!!!!! So, plz tell me what u expect so next tut I can fix :)

item.title: HELp MOD PLZ answer
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

I’m no mod, but here’s what they expect:

[quote=" Tutorial sectional rules"][u]When Posting a New Tutorial

When you are posting a new tutorial, be sure that it covers all of the following:

  • It shows some effort put into it – it’s your work, show some pride!

  • It’s a tutorial relevant directly to RuneScape 2 Private Servers and nothing else.

  • Any code snippets provided have been thoroughly explained with careful detail.

  • Make sure that the work you post is only yours, unless you have permission to post someone else’s work and accredit them appropriately. Stealing work is not tolerated here.

  • You may post a tutorial that has already been created if and only if it surpasses any existing tutorials of its type.[/quote]

Read full topic
